## DashboardComponent
主页面
> new DashboardComponent()
#### Properties:
-isPermission:boolean
-rid:undefined
-username:undefined
-status:undefined
-isCollapsed:undefined
-menuList:undefined
-topMenuList:undefined
-leftMenuSelectIndex:number
-topMenuSelectIndex:number
-isCurrentTopMenu:boolean
#### Methods:
-signOut 登出
-getMenu 获取菜单
